amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds for the Food and Agriculture Organization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 236 (Roll no. 309).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 236 (Roll no. 309).
